text: my name is Taylor Carroll and I am the
co-founder of game changer charity game
changer charity is a non-profit
committed to leveraging gaming
technology and innovation to support
patients rights to play learn and
socialize we have the privilege of
providing care through a number of ways
from character based scholarships to
custom gaming solutions to a solution
that we're most excited about virtual
reality utilizing and partnering with
Amazon Web Services Sumerian product
we've been able to empower care
providers across the country to use
templates of VR experiences to create
hyper personalized VR experiences for
patients everywhere something we've been
incredibly privileged by is the fact
that we've been able to grow from a
garage endeavor into a nonprofit that
now is international that this year
alone has brought in over 20 million
dollars worth of donations with 93 cents
on every dollar going to the cause and
in that incredible scaling we saw a huge
need for us to help as many patients as
possible and we decided to partner with
Amazon Web Services because it allowed
us to scale from zero to 100 at the
click of a button at game-changer we
focus on implementing VR in three main
ways first end-of-life care
second distraction therapy third
education the most resounding feedback
that GameChanger charity gets from our
doctors our nurses our Child Life staff
partners is how easy the new products
have been to use and that for us is
truly music to our ears it's it's an
indication that it's a product well
built and it's a product that will be
used when we as game-changer
representatives aren't there that for us
is inspiring because it shows that the
tools that we built through Cimmerian
can be utilized day-in day-out by care
providers who spend time with the
patients who need it most
the cloud has enabled us to do so many
amazing programs and partnerships that
we would have never imagined possible
even 36 months ago
